actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to exempt nonquota tobacco from quota restrictions in effect for any marketing year in any State in which not more than 20 acres of quota tobacco is planted for harvest in such marketing year.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to exempt nonquota tobacco from quota restrictions for any marketing year in any State in which not more than 20 acres of quota tobacco is planted for harvest in such marketing year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to exempt nonquota tobacco from quota restrictions in effect for any marketing year in any State in which not more than 20 acres of quota tobacco is planted for harvest in such marketing year.
